DOC.brief_title: Investigation Three Contraceptive Hormone Patches Regard Inhibition Ovulation Following Application Over 3 Treatment Cycles Healthy , Young Women .
DOC.criteria: Healthy female volunteer age 18 35 year ( smoker old 30 year , inclusive ) ovulatory pretreatment cycle Contraindications use combine ( estrogen/gestodene ) contraceptive ( e.g . history venous arterial thromboembolic disease ) Regular intake medication Oral Contraception Clinically relevant finding ( blood pressure , physical gynecological examination , laboratory examination )
